name: Highway Pursuit (2022 Prototype)
description:
Take down street racers in a high-speed pursuit on an endless scrolling desert highway

If you are familiar with the Burnout series or have played OnRush you will know what you have to do. Take down as many street racers as possible, but beware of the traffic!

  • Slam opponents into traffic or grind/rub them until their car collapses.
  • Red racers are tough enemies and blue ones are easy to shut down but do not count as a take down.
  • Prevent crashes! You cannot race forever. You have 3 tries until your car is totalled.

The game is inspired by Adam Dawes' Highway Pursuit, but the Spy Hunter component has been replaced with Burnout's takedown mechanic.

This is a prototype. There could be bugs and stability issues.

Controls

  • Arrow keys - Accelerate, Steer Left/Right, Brake
  • B - Boost
Freak Mind Games · Highway Pursuit (2022 Prototype)
